pr_title: Fix newly added entry not synced to db

timeline.message:
Fix newly added entry not synced to db


Newly added entries have empty fields; don't update the field table to prevent SQL Exception
Fix shared entry not found by id
use left outer join for this

Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' into sharedDbInsert

* upstream/master:
  Disable SLR in UI until #7126 is merged (#7179)

timeline.bodyText: Isn't this always an empty list (as expected entry is empty)?
timeline.author: tobiasdiez

replies.bodyText:
Hm, seems like I need to adapt the queries a bit. Didn't think about this,
I should check for the shared entry id to be present.
replies.author: Siedlerchr

replies.bodyText: To be honest, I've no idea what the test is doing. You add an empty entry, then some other completely unrelated entry, and then compare against the empty entry again.
replies.author: tobiasdiez

timeline.author: tobiasdiez

timeline.bodyText:

timeline.author: koppor
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -493,7 +499,7 @@ public void removeEntries(List<BibEntry> bibEntries) {
              .append("F.").append(escape("VALUE"))
              .append(" FROM ")
              .append(escape("ENTRY"))
-             .append(" inner join ")
